messages.content: What type of license is the pose-generator-comfyui-node released under?
The pose-generator-comfyui-node is released under the GNU General Public License Version 3.
What is the purpose of the GNU General Public License?
The purpose of the GNU General Public License is to guarantee the freedom to share and change all versions of a program and to make sure it remains free software for all its users.
Does the GPL allow charging for software distributed under its terms?
Yes, the GPL allows charging for software distributed under its terms, but it must be provided with full access to the source code.
What is the difference between 'propagate' and 'convey' in terms of the GPL?
To 'propagate' a work means to do anything with it that requires permission, while to 'convey' a work means any kind of propagation that enables other parties to make or receive copies.
What is considered a 'covered work' under the GPL?
A 'covered work' means either the unmodified Program or a work based on the Program.
Can a program licensed under the GNU GPL be incorporated into proprietary programs?
No, the GNU General Public License does not permit incorporating a program into proprietary programs.
If a program is released under the GNU GPL, is the author or copyright holder liable for damages?
No, the GNU GPL includes a disclaimer of warranty and a limitation of liability, protecting the author or copyright holder from liability for damages.
What is the purpose of the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The pose-generator-comfyui-node is designed to generate OpenPose poses and build character reference sheets in ComfyUI with ease.
Who created the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The pose-generator-comfyui-node was made by the CozyMantis squad.
How can you install the pose-generator-comfyui-node?

To install the pose-generator-comfyui-node, you need to clone the repo into the `custom_nodes/cozy-pose-generator` directory and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install the required dependencies.
What type of reference poses can be generated with the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
The pose-generator-comfyui-node can generate both face and body reference poses.
Is there an example workflow available for the pose-generator-comfyui-node?
Yes, there is an example workflow available called 'Cozy Character Face Generator - ComfyUI SD 1.5 Workflow For Reference Sheets'.
Where can the example workflow for the pose-generator-comfyui-node be found?

The example workflow for the pose-generator-comfyui-node can be found at [https://cozymantis.gumroad.com/l/character-face-consistency-reference-sheet-comfyui-workflow-sd15?layout=profile](https://cozymantis.gumroad.com/l/character-face-consistency-reference-sheet-comfyui-workflow-sd15?layout=profile).
What does the example workflow for the pose-generator-comfyui-node demonstrate?
The example workflow for the pose-generator-comfyui-node demonstrates how to create a character face consistency reference sheet using ComfyUI SD 1.5.
